Name: Sahot Group
description:
Sahot is a 45-year-old married mother with three children, and she resides in the Tbong Khmum Province of Cambodia. She is a farmer and has also been working as a laborer for others since 2009. Her husband is a 43-year-old farmer too, and her two teenagers are working as laborers while other kid is a student. All together, they can earn approximately $25 per day.

Sahot is the group leader. She requests a loan as part of a group of three members; she will use her portion to pay the rent for some land on which she will develop her farming doings. This loan helps her to improve her revenue as well as her family's standard of living.

Sahot is shown first from the right. For her future plans, she wants to buy more farmland, support her youngest child to earn higher education, and save money to renovate her house.
